(:06) (Shotgun) 20-L.Booker left guard to MIA 24 for 4 yards (50-M.Vrabel). Patriots are the first team in NFL history to go 15-0. Patriots are the first team in NFL history to win 15 consecutive games in a single season. Patriots 18th straight regular season win over 2 years, tying their NFL record set in 2003-04. Patriots 15th win of season, franchise record. Patriots tie the NFLâs all-time record for most regular season victories (15) set by the '04 Steelers, '98 Vikings, '85 Bears and '84 49ers. Patriots have gone undefeated in division games for the first time in franchise history.
